summary.span: 命名空間包含 Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe) 命令列工具所使用的類別，以及讓使用者程式碼在中繼資料和遠端基礎結構的 XML 結構描述之間相互轉換的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains the classes that are used by the Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe) command-line tool and the user code to convert metadata to and from XML schema for the remoting infrastructure.

summary.span: 這個命名空間的類別中，最重要者包括 類別和 類別。

span.span: Some of the most important classes of this namespace are the class and the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別由遠端基礎結構來產生 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的伺服器端上。The class is used by the remoting infrastructure to generate Web Services Description Language (WSDL) on the server side. 類別提供的功能[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100))命令列工具，並可用以程式設計方式來達到相同的結果。The class provides the functionality of the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100)) command-line tool, and can be used programmatically to achieve the same outcome. 方法的類別可用於建立 XML 結構描述，描述在原始程式碼中，所公開的服務，以及從 XML 結構描述建立 C# 程式碼。The methods of the class can be used to create XML schemas that describe services that are exposed in source code, and to create C# code from XML schema.
